amendatorysection.para: (1) Finding adoptive families for children for whom state assistance is provided pursuant to sections 43-117 and 43-118 and assuring the protection of the interests of the children affected during the entire assistance period require special measures when the adoptive parents move to other states or are residents of another state; and
(2) Providing medical and other necessary services for children, with state assistance, is more difficult when the services are provided in other states.
